ABOUT MATHEMATICS

CLASS - 12TH

  • संबंध एवं फलन वस्तुनिष्ठ प्रश्न प्रश्न 1. सही विकल्प चुनेंकर लिखें – प्रश्न 1. मान लीजिए कि f (x) = 8x द्वारा परिभाषित फलन f : R → R फलन है - (a) f एकैकी आचादक है (b) f बहुएक आचादक है (c) f एकाकी है अन्य आच्छादक नहीं है (d) एफ न तो एकैकी है और न अचाडक है। उत्तर: (ए) एफ एककी आच्छादक है


  • प्रश्न 2. फलन f(x) =इएक्स2−इ−एक्स2इएक्स2+इ−एक्स2परिभाषा फलन f : R → R है - (ए) एफ एकैकी है लेकिन एकाकी है नहीं है (बी) एफ एकाकी है और नहीं है (सी) एफ नहीं तो एकाकी है और नहीं है (डी) एफ है बहुएक आचाडक है। उत्तर: (ए) एफ एकैकी है लेकिन अचाडक नहीं है


  • प्रश्न 3. यदि f : R → R, f(x) = (3 – x 3 ) 1/3 प्रदत्त है तो fof(x) समतुल्य हैं – (a) x 1/3 (b) x 3 (c) x (d) (3 – x 3 ) उत्तर: (c) x


  • प्रश्न 4. a * b = a 3 + b 3 प्रकार की परिभाषा है, बुरा क्रमविनिमेय नहीं है (डी) * न तो क्रमविनिमेय है और न सहचर्य है। उत्तर: (बी) * क्रमविनिमय है, मित्रता सहचर्य नहीं है


Mathematics is the science and study of quality, structure, space, and change. Mathematicians seek out patterns, formulate new conjectures, and establish truth by rigorous deduction from appropriately chosen axioms and definitions.

High School Mathematics at Work illuminates the interplay between technical and academic mathematics. This collection of thought-provoking essays—by mathematicians, educators, and other experts—is enhanced with illustrative tasks from workplace and everyday contexts that suggest ways to strengthen high school mathematical education. National Academies of Sciences, Engineering, and Medicine. 1998. High School Mathematics at Work: Essays and Examples for the Education of All Students. Washington, DC: The National Academies Press. https://doi.org/10.17226/5777.

Mathematics is the science and study of quality, structure, space, and change. Mathematicians seek out patterns, formulate new conjectures, and establish truth by rigorous deduction from appropriately chosen axioms and definitions.

The book addresses the role of standards in mathematics education, discussing issues such as finding common ground between science and mathematics education standards, improving the articulation from school to work, and comparing SAT results across settings. National Academies of Sciences, Engineering, and Medicine. 1998. High School Mathematics at Work: Essays and Examples for the Education of All Students. Washington, DC: The National Academies Press. https://doi.org/10.17226/5777.
